title: Typeface found in 1968 Newsweek
content:
This image is from a 1968 issue of newsweek, and the article is about the Republican National Convention going to Miami. I’m researching the photo and I could really use an ID on the typeface on the hat, as well as on the sash. Someone out there knows this... Thanks for looking!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090607101708im_/http:/typophile.com/files/miami_girl_3887.jpg)
author: rfarrell

comments.content:
Hat - I’m gunna go with [P.T. Barnum](http://web.archive.org/web/20090607101708/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/bitstream/pt_barnum_regular_ot/?sample_text=REPUBLICAN&sample_size=60)

Sash - a [Clarendon](http://web.archive.org/web/20090607101708/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/clarendon/?refby=typographica)
